{{Infobox CHL season | title = 1985â86 OJHL season | colour = #007AC2 | colour text = #FFFFFF | league = [[Ontario Provincial Junior A Hockey League (1972-1987)|Ontario Junior Hockey League]] | league abr = OJHL | logo = | duration = '''Regular season'''
1985-09 â 1986-02
'''Playoffs'''
1986-02 â 1986-04 | champions = [[Orillia Travelways]] | no of teams = 6 | commissioner = | prev year = [[1984â85 OJHL season|1984â85]] | next year = [[1986â87 OJHL season|1986â87]] }} The '''1985â86 OJHL [[Season (sports)|season]]''' is the [[List of OJHL seasons|14th]] season of the [[Ontario Provincial Junior A Hockey League (1972-1987)|Ontario Junior Hockey League]] (OJHL). The six teams of the league played a 50-game season. The top four teams made the playoffs. The winner of the OJHL playoffs, the [[Orillia Travelways]], won the 1986 Buckland Cup for the OHA championship and the [[Dudley Hewitt Cup]] for the Central Canadian Championship. The Travelways failed to win the [[1986 Centennial Cup]].http://members.shaw.ca/vernonfranchise/league/cups/national_champions.html ==Changes== *[[Owen Sound Greys]] join OJHL from [[Mid-Western Junior Hockey League|MWJHL]]. *[[Whitby Lawmen]] go on hiatus then fold. *[[North York Rangers|North York Red Wings]] leave the OJHL. *[[Aurora Tigers]] take one-year leave. ==Final standings== ''Note: GP = Games played; W = Wins; L = Losses; OTL = Overtime Losses; SL = Shootout Losses; GF = Goals For; GA = Goals Against; PTS = Points; x = clinched playoff berth; y = clinched division title; z = clinched conference title'' {| cellpadding="0" |- align="left" style="vertical-align: top" | | {| cellpadding="1" width="400px" style="font-size: 90%; border: 1px solid gray;" |- align="center" bgcolor="#eeeeee" |colspan="11"|'''Teams''' |- align="center" bgcolor="#dddddd" |'''Team''' ||'''GP''' || '''W''' || '''L''' || '''T''' || '''GF''' || '''GA''' || '''P''' |- align="center" |[[Couchiching Terriers|Orillia Travelways]] ||50 ||35 ||15 ||0 ||305 ||205 ||70 |- align="center" |[[Markham Waxers]] ||50 ||25 ||16 ||9 ||244 ||263 ||59 |- align="center" |[[Owen Sound Greys]] ||50 ||25 ||20 ||5 ||254 ||232 ||55 |- align="center" |[[Newmarket Hurricanes|Newmarket Flyers]] ||50 ||21 ||19 ||10 ||237 ||226 ||52 |- align="center" |[[North York Rangers|Richmond Hill Dynes]] ||50 ||17 ||30 ||3 ||252 ||292 ||37 |- align="center" |[[Dixie Beehives]] ||50 ||10 ||33 ||7 ||208 ||281 ||27 |} |} ==1985-86 OJHL Playoffs== :''For the Central Canada Championship, please go to the '''[[Dudley Hewitt Cup]]'''.'' :''For the National Championship, please go to the '''[[1986 Centennial Cup]]'''.'' '''''Semi-final''''' :'''[[Orillia Travelways]]''' defeated [[Newmarket Flyers]] ''4-games-to-1'' :'''[[Markham Waxers]]''' defeated [[Owen Sound Greys]] ''4-games-to-1'' '''''Final''''' :'''[[Orillia Travelways]]''' defeated [[Markham Waxers]] ''4-games-to-1'' ==OHA Buckland Cup Championship== The 1986 Buckland Cup was a best-of-7 series between the [[Onaping Falls Huskies]] ([[NOJHL]]) and the [[Orillia Travelways]]. The winner moved on to the 1986 [[Dudley Hewitt Cup]] Final Series. :'''[[Orillia Travelways]]''' defeated [[Onaping Falls Huskies]] ([[NOJHL]]) ''4-games-to-2'' ::'''Orillia''' 3 - Onaping Falls 2 ::'''Onaping Falls''' - Orillia ::'''Onaping Falls''' 6 - Orillia 5 ::'''Orillia''' 6 - Onaping Falls 5 (OT) ::'''Orillia''' 5 - Onaping Falls 4 ::'''Orillia''' 5 - Onaping Falls 3 ==1986 [[Dudley Hewitt Cup]] Championship== The 1986 Dudley Hewitt Cup was a best-of-7 series between the [[Brockville Braves]] ([[CenJHL|CJHL]]) and the [[Orillia Travelways]]. The winner moved on to the [[1986 Centennial Cup]]. :'''[[Orillia Travelways]]''' defeated [[Brockville Braves]] ''4-games-to-3'' ::'''Brockville''' 8 - Orillia 1 ::'''Brockville''' 9 - Orillia 1 ::'''Orillia''' 9 - Brockville 8 ::'''Orillia''' 6 - Brockville 5 ::'''Orillia''' 6 - Brockville 3 ::'''Brockville''' - Orillia ::'''Orillia''' 7 - Brockville 4 ==[[1986 Centennial Cup]] Championship== The 1986 Centennial Cup was the Canadian National Junior A championship in [[Cole Harbour, Nova Scotia]], hosted by the [[Cole Harbour Colts]]. The [[Orillia Travelways]] lost in the semi-final. '''''Round Robin''''' :'''[[Orillia Travelways]]''' defeated [[Dieppe Commandos|Moncton Hawks]] ([[MVJHL]]) 4-3 :'''[[Cole Harbour Colts]]''' (MVJHL) defeated [[Orillia Travelways]] 9-5 :'''[[Penticton Knights]]''' ([[BCJHL]]) defeated [[Orillia Travelways]] 5-2 '''''Semi-final''''' :'''[[Penticton Knights]]''' (BCJHL) defeated [[Orillia Travelways]] 7-3 ==Leading Scorers== {| cellpadding="0" |- align="left" style="vertical-align: top" | | {| cellpadding="1" width="450px" style="font-size: 90%; border: 1px solid gray;" |- ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="30%" | Player ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="30%" | Team ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="7.5%" | GP ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="7.5%" | G ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="7.5%" | A ! bgcolor="#DDDDFF" width="7.5%" | Pts |- |[[Randy LeBrasseur]] ||[[North York Rangers|Richmond Hill Dynes]] ||46 ||32 ||79 ||111 |- |[[Scott Wingrove]] ||[[North York Rangers|Richmond Hill Dynes]] ||49 ||47 ||60 ||107 |} |} ==Players taken in the [[1986 NHL Entry Draft]]== *''Rd 6 #115'' '''[[Matt O'Toole]]''' - [[St. Louis Blues (ice hockey)|St. Louis Blues]] ([[Markham Waxers]]) *''Rd 12 #236'' '''[[Doug Kirkton]]''' - [[New Jersey Devils]] ([[Orillia Travelways]]) ==See also== * [[1986 Centennial Cup]] * [[Dudley Hewitt Cup]] * [[List of OJHL seasons]] * [[Northern Ontario Junior Hockey League]] * [[Central Junior A Hockey League]] * [[Thunder Bay Flyers]] * [[1985 in ice hockey]] * [[1986 in ice hockey]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.ojhl.pointstreaksites.com/ Official website of the Ontario Junior Hockey League] * [http://cjhlhockey.com/ Official website of the Canadian Junior Hockey League] {{-}} {{Start box}} {{Succession box | before = [[1984â85 OJHL season]] | after = [[1986â87 OJHL season]] | title = [[List of OJHL seasons|Ontario Hockey Association
Junior A Seasons]] | years = }} {{End box}} {{OJHL}} {{CJAHL}} {{DEFAULTSORT:1985â86 Ojhl Season}} [[Category:Ontario Junior Hockey League seasons]] [[Category:1985 in ice hockey|OPJHL]] [[Category:1986 in ice hockey|OPJHL]]
